Literature.Title: Multiple Strategy Optimization of Specifically Targeted Antimicrobial Peptide Based on Structure - Activity Relationships to Enhance Bactericidal Efficiency.
Literature.Author: Tan P, Lai Z, Zhu Y, Shao C, Akhtar MU, Li W, Zheng X, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=32 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:98% Killing=128 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:96% Killing=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=0.5µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli 078(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli 987P(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=2µM),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 13813(MIC=2µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 8014(MIC=64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 7469(MIC=64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.9205(MIC=32µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0911(MIC=64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0385(MIC=32µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0386(MIC=64µM)
